description: Rose Garden Witch Minion. Role: Landscaper.＠Its Witch styles its whiskers.
Rose Garden Witch Minion. Role: Alarm.＠A siren that rings upon finding humans, then charges at them headfirst. They have 20/20 vision. Small ones can even turn into rose vines to catch intruders.
Darkness Witch Minion. Role: Dream.＠Changes form to depict their Witch's desires in the dark. Though mighty in the dark, even weak light - a flashlight, or even moonlight - can halve its power.
Candy Witch Minion. Role: Cheese Scout.＠Don't rely on it too much.
Box Witch Minion. Role: Hauler.＠Everything it touches becomes light and easy to lift.

Graffiti Witch Minion. Role: Eternal Child.＠Separated from their Witch while playing alone. A human transformed into a ball by its powers must bounce as many times as lies they have told in their life, if they want to regain their lost form.
Silver Witch Minion. Role: Assertor.＠Emits a mix of clangs and bangs from its many pipes, and moves with the chaotic whimsy of a sandstorm. It hates magnets.
Shadow Witch Minion. Role: Blind Follower.＠A group of lives given grace by their Witch. They seek new brethren.
Dog Witch Minion. Role: Interior Designer.＠A mannequin that spins mindlessly. The unloved Dog Witch couldn't make a Minion with a mind of its own.
Artist Witch Minion. Role: Art Work.＠Takes body parts from their Witch's victims and incorporates them into themselves.
Rooftop Witch Minion. Role: Confiner.＠Always worrying that their Witch might fly away. They move around the school checking all the locks while cleaning. They never forget to point things out.
Sandbox Witch Minion. Role: Toy Train.＠Always playing with fellow Minions. Due to its texture and how it rolls on the ground, it always gets things stuck to itself.
Symbol Witch Minion. Role: Reproducer.＠It is said that it grows and transforms by absorbing vital energy from humans. This version is known as a Haunted Chair.
Sheep Witch Minion. Role: Shepherd.＠Strolls around the Labyrinth at ease. These Minions regard their Witch as their most precious possession.
There is a vast gap between ordinary girls and Magical Girls. An invisible but tremendous gap. However, armed with their "feelings" and "wishes" they can cross that gap in a single step.
Isn't this too flashy? The ribbon I picked out with my mom flutters in the breeze. I feel at ease, untouched by despair. "Yeah, a Magical Girl is still just a girl after all."

Three girls stand by Madoka Kaname. One is her carefree friend, one a dependable senpai, and the last, a mysterious transfer student... Each girl watches from their respective positions, bearing their own desires.

Like a great river, time flows from the past to the future. Resisting the current countless times, she continues her endless journey. She leaps into the torrent again, motivated by both an oath to herself and her irreplaceable friends.

pieceName: It's Not a Stuffed Animal, Is It?
description: Kyubey, you sure are strange... That thing coming out from your ear... Is that...a lock of hair or another...arm...? Those rings...are they attached to you or just floating there? And your tail!...Oh, I just want to grab it...

I can step forward knowing Mami will be ahead of me, no matter how unthinkable, bizarre or terrifying the situation might get. I can be brave with her by my side. Thank you for being so strong, so kind, so caring... I love you.

Kyoko: "Hey, Sayaka! Gimme a bite of that!"＠Sayaka: "What?! Another one?!＠Kyoko, do you even know what 'a bite' means?"＠Mami: "Oh, this will make the perfect picture! Say cheese!"＠ Sayaka & Kyoko: "Huh?"
There must be a way for the two of them to spend their days together, smiling and happy. She believes this with conviction. She just hasn't found it yet. She will find it. She has to....

These Girls don't regret becoming Magical Girls, because it's something they chose... They have resolved themselves not to flee from their fates. They face them head on and live so fiercely that they light the world in a brilliant blaze.
One girl made a contract.＠The other is hesitant to make her own.＠Still they stay together.＠They are friends, Magical Girl or not.

pieceSkill.name: Charge UP [V]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Damage After Using Charge UP [V] (Self/1 Turn)

pieceSkill2.name: Charge UP [VI]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Damage After Using Charge UP [VI] (Self/1 Turn)

description: A Magical Girl who has been fighting by herself has finally gotten a partner... A partner who calls her "Senpai". Through countless battles, their hearts grow ever closer.
I'll walk my own runway no matter what you say!＠It's my best chance of reaching the rest of the world!＠Paris, Rome, Milan, New York, London...＠One day they'll be backdrops to my showstopping clothes!
We can do it! Don't give up 'til it's over!＠I'm cheering for you at every turn!＠So keep your chin up and fight!＠Go! Fight! Win! Believe in yourself!＠Victory is yours!
Your first hint is a curious giggle. Then come glowing liquids, colorful smoke, and maybe even an explosion or two. It's the curtain call for the world's most exciting show!
Student council calls after badminton club is over! But first...a little break. Sasara Minagi has a lot of things to do after school. Not to mention her Magical Girl missions!

Flower arranging is like a mirror. You observe your own heart as you work, rather than the flowers. The beauty you see on the surface is only skin deep; true beauty is found only beyond the work you refine and hone.

pieceName: Like, Those are Meant for Me!
description: Ooooooh my god! Like, I'm freaking out, these shoes are so cute! Can you believe this?! They're totes perfect! I gotta have 'em! I'm saying I have to have them on my feet like, right this second. For sure. ...One thing, though, like, the price? Totally not cute enough. Fix it for me?

Nothing feels right, not at my house, my school, the town... No matter where I walk, who I talk with, I feel like I'm shrouded in a thin film keeping me from fitting into the rest of the world...I wonder if he felt the same way, trying to find where he belongs. I too must find where I belong, someday...

Between helping the needy, karate practice and Witch hunts... Everyday life can kick my butt kinda hard! But back in my room it's my time. I can read girly manga or romance novels with my stuffed animal and dolls. I gotta watch the new episode of the drama I recorded too! Will those two get together this time...?!
The dishes she creates shock and delight, causing even renowned gourmet critics and famous chefs to gasp in admiration... She might be young, but her talent is just as genuine as herself.
Paradise in my eyes is when books lie in heaped piles around me, tea and snacks within sight. I turn the pages gradually, not wanting to rush this lovely moment...!
A calm afternoon, just after midday. No matter how bossy she is in public, with her mother she's just a child. She knows she can't stay like this forever, but for now, let her dream a little...
Here we go...! Whooooooa! Feel the wrath of Chinese Kung Fu! Wh-wha?! Don't leap out from the hat yet! Grrr! You were supposed to wait for the punchline!

Her spirit won't be permeated by the endless struggles of this world. The goings-on of her friends, family, even perfect strangers surround her but never involve her. Her heart is frozen shut, empty of emotion... Or so she thought. Now the ice has started melting and she's started to lose her bearings.
The aroma, the colors, the shape— No, not just that. She picks just the right ribbons and wraps the sender's feelings inside. Here, take the feelings and the bouquet.

It's okay if I'm only dreaming, or even if it's all an illusion. Put aside any thoughts of guilt or deception. Just for now, I want to take in this sweet smell for a little longer, and let it cloud my senses.
What future will rise to the surface of her teacup? Salvation or ruin? Hope or despair? Her partner alone may lift her malaise by loading her cup with jam and sugar cubes.
Hey, don't look so sad. I'll take half your bags.＠There, now we can go wherever you want to go!
Not her mother nor her father. The first person to hold this girl's hand was a "hero" she knew nothing about. She no longer has to fear Witches or lonely nights.
Even if reality hits hard, stand up. Whether it's inevitable or not, now isn't the time to despair. You can become much stronger with friends by your side.
Is that mild smile that of an angel, or maybe a devil? We know not whose hand shapes the future, but it stirs now. Not even the gods know where she will go.

I wonder why Ui suddenly wanted a sketchbook? There do happen to be lots of talented girls around her... I wonder if she wants to measure up to them...? Hehe, I'm looking forward to whatever she draws.

Whenever I wonder why I keep on modeling, I remember that my life as a Magical Girl started from here. If I were to quit, why, that would render everything: all the trials and tribulations, all the miseries and joys, rather pointless.

pieceName: I'm Even the Mightiest at Hoops!

pieceSkill.name: Solidify [VII]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: DEF UP [VII] / Status Ailment Resistance UP [VI] (Self/1 Turn)

pieceSkill2.name: Solidify [VIII]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: DEF UP [VIII] / Status Ailment Resistance UP [VII] (Self/1 Turn)

description: If you wanna be the Mightiest Magical Girl, you need to be the best at everything! Basketball is no exception! Pass the ball to me, I'll score for sure! Traveling? What's that? Silly rules like that can't stop ME!

pieceName: It's Not Like I Was Waiting
description: Eating all my favorite sweets, my phone almost running out of batteries, sighing in disappointment... These things have nothing to do with you. Not at all. It's not like I was waiting or anything.

Even you, who I love so much, have bad days, for sure. Even still, you bring a smile to my face and give me courage. I can stand on my own personal stage as long as you're there. I scream with all my might, so you can shine from your idol's pedestal.

Do you like this tasty water? What kind of food do you like? How about whistling? I know we can't communicate...So I'll try to figure it out myself. Will you be my friends? We could play together, then take a nap...I'd love it if we could chat in my dreams.

Every morning I start by cleaning the dojo, and then... 1,000 practice swings! This is important! However! Don't just swing recklessly... Calm your nerves and check each and every movement! Every lunge counts in a real battle!

Momoko: "All right, we gotta beat Yachiyo.＠Let's quickly take care of these Minions, Iroha!"＠Iroha: "Right! The small Kyubey is leading us,＠but that doesn't mean we can lower our guard!＠I'll support from behind!"

Gentle sweetness paired with a hint of sour opens hearts.＠Three girls eat pudding as proof of their reconciliation.＠They also eat to welcome a new Magical Girl to Kamihama.＠"This makes Iroha our friend, too!"

Though they may squabble, the trust between these three is sincere. When a battle begins it's as if they had never argued at all. They fight in perfect sync, defeating enemy after enemy. "Rena take that one in the middle, Kaede tackle the ones on the sides! Leave the rear to me!"
Momoko: "You ready, Rena? Kaede?"＠Kaede: "Y...Yes..."＠Rena: "Pfft, who do you think you're talking to? Of course I am."＠Momoko: "All right! Time to hunt some Witches!"
I'm a Magical Girl! A Magical Girl who grants wishes and makes dreams come true! But, that's a secret, so... Please don't tell my classmates!
Wearing matching glasses, they walk through town admiring the same old scenery with a new perspective through the lenses. Hearts united, they walk until the sun sets...

One slices through night shadows with her sharp blade, one blasts through nightmares with her gun, one spears the threat with a wavering lance; one strides through time, buckler shimmering, entwining their fates all the more.
Sayaka: "Here I come.... Splash attack!"＠Madoka: "Eep! Hey, Sayaka! It's cooooold!"＠Kyoko: "Ugh, quit it! My ice cream's gonna melt!"＠Sayaka: "Heheh, melt away!"
We won't lose, no matter what Witch we take on! There's no fate we can't change! Magical Girls make hopes and dreams come true. If we keep believing, we can make miracles happen!
I feel warm when I dream about you. Now that I remember the reason I became a Magical Girl, I know why... Wait for me... No matter how hard it may be, I won't give up until I find you.
In my many days of battle, I've seen countless sad sights, and endured just as many bitter moments... No matter what, I've resolved to live, so my past does not lose its meaning...

I'm bearing the future of my family on my own two shoulders... Under pressure? You bet! But I'll take care of it! I just gotta grab whatever chances I can, and tackle 'em with all I've got! Leave it to me, Tsuruno Yui!

Inside every person, there's a brightness...their hopes and dreams. I see it eeeverywhere! I won't let them be snuffed out... I'll protect them, keep them burning! I mean, that's what a Magical Girl does after all!

pieceSkill.name: Inevitable [V]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Critical Hit Chance [V] / Negate Evade (Self/3 Turns)

pieceSkill2.name: Inevitable [VI]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Critical Hit Chance [VI] / Negate Evade (Self/3 Turns)

description: I promised back then. That I would protect and save you. Even if that means I have to leap through time over and over again, I won't regret that choice. If there's enemies in the way, I won't hesitate to pull the trigger. Wait for me, Madoka... I'll change fate for you!

pieceSkill.name: Revenge Adept [IV]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Get More MP when Hit by Weak Element [IV]

pieceSkill2.name: Revenge Adept [V]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Get More MP when Hit by Weak Element [V]

description: The aroma of tea wafts through the air, soothing her body.＠The flavor of tea after a Witch's defeat is her favorite...＠Slowly bringing in peace in such a fashion, you'd never imagine she was battling mere moments before.

A nutritionally balanced recipe written with specific instructions.＠Seems like Iroha's handwriting, but she doesn't recall writing it.＠ She tries making it, but she has no idea, in that moment, who she wrote it for.

Cursed chain mail that tears out your soul... A mysterious soldier appearing in a Sankyo Ward school... Credible rumors and urban legends like this are logged in the "Kamihama Rumor Files". A new rumor was added just today.

An old Chinese restaurant stands downtown. It was started by her grandfather and great-grandfather, who brought back their knowledge of Chinese cuisine from their time in the military. Many people think the food there looks and tastes "Okay".
Idols shine like stars. Even their merchandise glows bright and true. Every time she sees that shining scenery, she hates herself a little more.

She thinks she's too boyish to join in with girl talk. The truth is that she actually loves girly cute things more than anyone. When will the time come for a girl who believes she doesn't fit the typical image of femininity to come out about her inner little girl?
A girl who has loved the company of plants and animals from a young age. She is best friends with all creatures, and they know it. A home filled with nature is Heaven on Earth to her.

When the mind is unjust, the sword is sure to follow. She has honed her skills to that mantra, that she might one day inherit her family's historic dojo. Her straightforward attitude and highly polished swordsmanship have nearly reached the level where she can do just that.

I still can't settle on what wish I want granted... It would be great to become a glorious hero, helping others just like Mami... Before she knew it, being a Magical Girl had become a dream for Madoka.

pieceName: I Want to Be Able to Protect Her
description: I want the power to protect her. This is the wish that made her a Magical Girl. She will do anything it takes to protect the person she swore to protect, no matter how dangerous.
An elegantly arranged afternoon tea spread. Rest is absolutely vital for girls who wish to continue fighting.

I want to be a fashion designer who makes clothes that speak to the whole world! She refines her fashion sense every day in pursuit of that dream. True, her tastes are unusual and surprise those around her. But she refuses to let that bring her down, and persists nonetheless.

To her, happiness is playing baseball with everyone.＠Even when breaking a sweat during summer with the boys,＠or bleeding profusely from both her hands in the winter,＠she was happy because everyone was there with her.

She has become ever more absorbed, day after day, since she learned how charming chemistry can be. Today's agenda is the "Chameleon Experiment": Each vial changes to a different color depending on the reaction within, much like a beautiful art piece.
As a child, she watched her father as he put his life on the line to save others. He looked like a brave knight in a picture book. That admiration transformed into a desire to be just like him.
In Japanese tea ceremony, there is a useful idiom: Ichigo Ichie. It means that you may meet someone only one time in your life. This is why we do our best to deliver the finest hospitality.

There is a strange rumor in Kamihama. There is a girl at a mysterious counseling room in the Suitoku Shopping Mall who can solve any problem you bring to her. Every day, some lost lamb visits her there.

There is a girl who helps out at an old fashioned coffee shop where the sun lights up the room and the young and old alike gather. With her calm aura, she fits the atmosphere well, but if you watch her closely, you might notice her making a melancholy expression...

She was taught from childhood that the power of martial arts is "for giving a helping hand to those who need it". She was raised to gain strength through those principles, and that is why she can sport her black belt at this young age.

Her family runs a traditional restaurant that serves up an array of taste sensations. The quality isn't diminished when packed into a bento box, hence the high volume of repeat customers. Customers who can't manage to secure one of the limited boxes come back and try again another day.

She loves reading and resides in "Natsume Books". Whenever she is at home or the library, she buries herself in words and loses all track of time. A life spent in the company of books is her personal paradise.

A girl from the Blue Seas Family, wishing to become someone others could rely on, instead of being someone who relies on others, trained tirelessly to acquire the Kung Fu technique, "Blue Jade Fist." The bloody journey of her training is told in the scarred, damaged body of this wooden dummy.

pieceName: Smile and the World Smiles Too
description: She admired her friend who was bright like the sun and had an infectious smile. Eventually, she resolved to become that kind of person herself.

She tried her hand at studying, hobbies, learning crafts, all manner of things. She has been swimming since she was a child. All this, and yet nothing holds any interest for her. She spends every day in a state of pure boredom.

Passion, friendship, faith, peace, optimism...＠Resentment, enmity, doubt, turmoil, misery...＠Each and every flower carries a message.＠This is one of the things that gives flowers＠their beauty and allure.
She's in love with all the most popular fashions, all the latest cosmetics. She loves girly fashion, but she is often treated with prejudice for her appearance.

Since my childhood, I have read "Crime and Punishment" more times than I can recall. The protagonist bears a striking resemblance to that girl. However, only those who can bear the "weight of death" are fit to become her pawns.

All that's left inside her is "love". Usamaru was the first present she received from her beloved Oriko. The same deep affection she has for Oriko, she has for Usamaru as well. She will do anything in the name of that "love".

The hero who saved her placed a candy into her hand. Its sweetness washed the bad memories away in just one bite. I want to fight alongside my hero, she thought, and swore silently to herself that she would.

pieceName: It's a Holiday! Nap All You Like

pieceSkill.name: Jamming Edge [II]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Skill Seal (3 Turns) Chance upon Attack [II]

pieceSkill2.name: Jamming Edge [III]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Skill Seal (3 Turns) Chance upon Attack [III]

description: Her light nap was drawn down into a deep slumber by the warm rays of sunlight. She keeps her darkness hidden in her own shadow. What kind of dreams does she have? "Hey, Iroha, help me out!" "What? Huh?" "This is how you wake up a naughty girl like her!" "AHAHAHAHA! Don't tickle me!"

pieceSkill.name: Reject Counter
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Negate Counter (Self/3 Turns) / ATK UP [VIII] (Self/1 Turn)

pieceSkill2.name: Reject Counter
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Negate Counter (Self/3 Turns) / ATK UP [IX] (Self/1 Turn)

description: The day she spent with her family having fun at the farm was a miracle. Her parents said not one ill word to each other. They spent the day smiling together, and she didn't want the day to end when they kissed her goodnight. That day, she was an undeniably happy child, proof that they were the best family in the whole world.

Yachiyo: "You'll never learn to swim if you keep using a swim tube." Iroha: "Y-Yachiyo, stop tugging on it! I don't need to learn how to swim!" Tsuruno: "Yachiyo! Iroha!" Yachiyo: "Yes?" Iroha: "Hm?" CLICK! Tsuruno: "Now that's definitely going in my album!"

pieceSkill.name: Guard Adept [III]
pieceSkill.eventDescription: and +1 to any Colored Pencil drop

pieceSkill2.name: Guard Adept [IV]
pieceSkill2.eventDescription: and +2 to any Colored Pencil drop

description: I take one step into this colorless world to say goodbye.

pieceSkill.name: Magia Adept [VII]
pieceSkill.eventDescription: and +3 to any Colored Pencil drop

pieceSkill2.name: Magia Adept [IX]
pieceSkill2.eventDescription: and +7 to any Colored Pencil drop

description: I still get nervous when texting you, even though, with that one small act, I can see you anywhere. It's our meeting spot. Thank you for always coming to see me here.

pieceSkill2.name: Chase Attack
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Guaranteed Follow Up Attack (Self/1 Turn) / Magia Damage UP [IX]

description: The day we met you taught me something so important. "There are many beautiful things in this world I have yet to see." The sunset I drew with my colors was still black and white because my heart had not yet caught up to you.

The joy in my body I felt when I saw that present, the pounding in my heart when I wrote that first page...even after 5 years, 10 years, no matter how many years pass...I'll never forget it. No matter how many pages I flip through, forwards or backwards, I will never feel this way again.

pieceSkill.name: Guardian
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Guaranteed Guard for near-fainting Allies (Self/1 Turn)
pieceSkill.eventDescription: and +2 to any Colored Pencil drop

pieceSkill2.name: Guardian
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Guaranteed Guard for near-fainting Allies / HP Regen [IX] (Self/1 Turn)
pieceSkill2.eventDescription: and +3 to any Colored Pencil drop

description: What did I dream about while I was waiting for you? Did I dream about my secret memories of that day, the ones I wrote about in my diary? It's not a sad thing to wake from a happy dream. I'll just continue the dream awake, here with you.

All this food, mostly snacks and fruit, barely fit into her bag. Common things to ordinary people with ordinary lives. But for her, having experienced what she has... She hates to waste any of it. To her they are the most important things in life.

Perhaps another world could have existed where Witches weren't a part of my day-to-day life. Maybe I would have gone to school like normal, chatted with friends like normal, and gone home after school like normal.

My wish was such a petty, little thing. I thought it was a good one, but in the end it was a big mistake... Which is why I promised myself, from now on, no more mistakes. I'm just gonna live for myself. That's my conviction, and I won't falter in it.

The house brought me in when I had no one else left in the world. I still dream of it even now, even with it long gone... How we laughed and cried and fought amongst those blossoming Azaleas... I can no longer go back to the precious house I held so dear...

The sunshine is warm, but the air still has a bite to it. Nothing warms you up during times like these like a hot cup of tea. So let's pull out our favorite cups and have a tea break. I might not be good at cooking, but I can make tea at least...right?

"Today we have 2 appointments at 3 pm and on the way back we'll buy groceries, then we prepare dinner at 6 pm... Oh, right! I have to repair the furniture Ayame broke! Um, and then after that...what was it?"

"Hm? What's that? Sorry, sorry, I was looking at my phone. Oh, nothing much, just data I've gathered for our upcoming battles, of course! *Giggle* Okay, you got me, that was a lie... I'm just reading comics. This one is SO good, though! You should read it too, Konoha!"

"Look, look! It's treasures I found! This one's a SUPER rare jewel... What! No, it ain't just a marble! And here, a piece of shedded skin from a monster... Nooo! It's not from a cricket! You don't know anythin'! I've got a beautiful collection here!"

"Do ya know the tastiest way to eat a candy? Like this! See? Whatcha think? Look, look! When you're upside down, you can taste the yumminess better! ...Huh? That's just me? No way! Try it, you'll see!"

pieceSkill.name: Managizer Adept [IV]
pieceSkill.eventDescription: and +1 to any Red Azalea drop and +1 to any White Azalea drop

pieceSkill2.name: Managizer Adept [V]
pieceSkill2.eventDescription: and +2 to any Red Azalea drop and +2 to any White Azalea drop

description: This photo is from a time when we were loved by someone... But once I take my eyes off of it, I see "the present" that I find myself in. I know we have to rise to fight "the present"...but please, just let me glance at the past for a little longer.

pieceSkill.name: War Cry [IX]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Damage Inflicted DOWN [IX] (All Foes/1 Turn) / Status Ailment Resistance UP [VIII] (Self/1 Turn)
pieceSkill.eventDescription: and +3 to any White Azalea drop

pieceSkill2.name: War Cry [X]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Damage Inflicted DOWN [IX] (All Foes/1 Turn) / Status Ailment Resistance UP [VIII] (Self/1 Turn)
pieceSkill2.eventDescription: and +7 to any White Azalea drop

description: Oh, hold on a moment! If you have terms, I'd love to hear them! The two girls back there? Don't mind them, they're cool! Nothing to worry about! After all...this is kinda like my job. So let me hear what you have to say...!

pieceSkill.name: Esperansa Adept [III]
pieceSkill.eventDescription: and +3 to any Red Azalea drop

pieceSkill2.name: Esperansa Adept [IV]
pieceSkill2.eventDescription: and +7 to any Red Azalea drop

description: I get so excited before I go out! What'm I gonna do today with those two? We'll meet up and play, right? And then, you know! Oooh, it'll be sooo fun! But this feeling makes my heart hurt... I remember before I was a Magical Girl, it was like this every day...

She can't convey all her passionate feelings in a text message. She wants to tell him face to face, but she's too nervous to even look at him. She'll need to cram all those feelings into a letter. She was determined when she went to bed, but is back to fretting again with the coming of the morning.

Today I'm in his group for cooking class! I even practiced making croquettes with my mom. What if he says: "Aimi, your cooking is awesome! It's so good, I almost want to ask you to be my wife!" Hang on! Waitwaitwait! It's a bit early for marriage!

A tiny little soul sitting alone... It meant a great deal to the girl it supported. It filled her heart, which felt like a gloomy back alley, with warmth and kindness. Now and then it still peeks its face out in her dreams.

(Oh...Iroha's right ahead of me... Is she going back to Yachiyo's house? Maybe I should hurry after her... Would it be annoying if I tagged along? If I just bumped into her by chance, we could go home and talk, couldn't we? She did say she needed me...) "Um, Iroha!"

pieceName: A Wild Welcome in the Sewer
description: They were guided by Felicia Mitsuki to the dark underground sewers, but no Magical Girls were there to greet them. Instead, there were shadowy creatures that lurked in the gloomy waterways! SKREE! SKREE SKREE! "AAAGH!" "UWAAAH!" "AAAHAHA!"

pieceSkill.name: Hard Cover
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Guaranteed Guard for Ally / DEF UP [VIII] (Self/1 Turn)

pieceSkill2.name: Hard Cover
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Guaranteed Guard for Ally / DEF UP [IX] (Self/1 Turn)

description: I vanished from this world, and the people in it, because I didn't belong anywhere. It was painful, and lonely. But because I went through all that, I met someone really important. Now, I won't give up on our friendship, no matter what happens. I'll give my all for her, because she treats me like I matter...

The blood flowing in my veins is my grandma's, and she seems to trouble everyone around her. I know there's no escaping that bond, but I found a way to spread just as much joy as trouble! Thus "Phantom Thief Karin" was born... A Magical Girl who brings happiness to the weak.

Oh, this is where she's gonna use her lock-picking skills! ...Or not? You're kidding! She stole the key from the guard she bumped into before?! I don't get it... Um, let's see, the explanation is in the notes in the back... Wow, how does the author even come up with this stuff?!

This get-up kinda suits me, huh? I was thinkin' I better start trick-or-treatin' and stock up on candy, but where to start... Heh, gotta start with her place, right? She'll probably have a tasty cake waitin' for me.

"My, Madoka, you did a wonderful job with the decorations."＠"I worked hard on them! But Mami, this cake looks great!"＠"Oh, I baked a special one today. Hmm, who's that at the＠door? Sayaka only just left to get drinks from the store a＠few minutes ago..."

I can't stop thinking about when we were all rehearsing those long hours together... Usually I'm just on my own drawing, but practicing lines with everyone was really refreshing...and fun! I wonder if they'd be up to do it again if I asked them.

I honestly thought I wasn't gonna make it in time for my big entrance! But things turned out as magical as the title, and the kids just ate it up! The biggest pain was right after the show finished. The kids bombarded me with questions, asking if I could really use magic, and I had to figure out how to dodge the question.

"I want a happy and loving family. I want to protect them."

(Memoria Enhancement Material) There is no longer any way to regain what is lost. Memories lose their shape and form with time, crumbling into pieces. Those memories, scattered from the palm of your hand, will pile up anew in your heart just like snow on a silent night.

description: She has no regrets. She doesn't miss the place she used to live, or her friends' house she used to visit. She is only determined to develop her new special "home" of relaxation.

A Magical Girl who claims to be the mightiest and has sworn to do great things... She is always optimistic, cheerful, and warm...she always gives us strength. She never gives up and has the power to withstand anything. Or so we thought... I'll never forgive myself. I can't.

When my life was about to fade away and I noticed the fate that I must face, I felt relieved to find someone that I could trust with my heart. Each page I wrote serves as proof. I will leave my will and true feelings with you.

description: I'd already given up on living a normal life as a normal girl. But for one second, I imagined myself having the life I wished I had. It was a terrible mistake, as it crushed the determination I once had. I am still not sure how I will ever be forgiven for my terrible sin.

I have to let go of the old me, and all her dreams... All I can do now is try to address the sins I've committed. That's why I want to save as many people as I possibly can. The Black Feathers, the White Feathers, and Yachan, too...

There were fewer Witches in Kamihama than I'd ever experienced in my 6 years of fighting them. We had an nonaggression pact with the east so as not to incur unnecessary casualties, but at the time... The obvious frigid tension in the air made me nervous.

We must face that, as Magical Girls, Grief Seeds are what matter...no matter how we may try to avoid injuries. There are limits to our patience, no matter how often we join forces. If the Witch drought continues, I fear our fights may grow even more vicious.

It does make my heart race to imagine it, and yet if the two of us are together I'm sure we'll have a good time, no matter what we plan to do. We should clasp each other's hand tightly, so we don't lose our way, or each other...

This prayer to be freed from our pain and misery shall reach out to the future. Our journey is almost over. Our goal is right in front of us. So let us pray, everyone. Pray for the sake of all Magical Girls to share the joy of achieving our greatest desires and become freed from this curse.

The hems are frayed, there are visible stains, the fabric is worn. It's clear this has been passed down through the hands of many girls. My friends invited me here, but I had no idea there was a little space like this, warm with sunlight and so pretty! All the Mitakihara girls will be here soon. Let's both go greet them!

We just happened to stumble on this perfect little place! With deliciously made tea and snacks, it transforms into a perfect spot for a break! It's too wonderful here to not share with all our friends.

Dusk is not a sad time, nor is it empty. This ribbon fluttering in my hair lets me feel your presence... You are with everyone always, but only I can feel you here with me. You said, "It's a little too soon to be giving up hope." You were right, so I won't give up either.

I'm bad with a knife, and I'm still pretty crummy at cooking, but I'm really good at seasoning and packing bentos now! So I'm gonna bring color to everything so it's super cute and yummy-looking. I won't let Witches or Familiars do whatever they want!

She always has a cheery smile and is quick to help out at the shop. Just seeing her can pick up your mood. Beloved by everyone, she's the Kosho Ward bento shop girl. "Thanks for waiting! Here you go, one fried chicken bento, our signature dish!"
Miss K was always happy for me when I did well, and there for me when I was sad. I want to do the same for her child. I hope one day you'll think of me as your "amazing Big Sis", little one.

Bad memories, copies of me, Familiars, and Witches... It all seems far away, now that I've woken from that scary dream. The older girls here are kind and strong, and this place, which I found by becoming a Magical Girl, calms my heart.

description: The streets are filled with so much kawaii stuff, I don't know where to put my eyes! Everything is so cute, I can't help wanting it ALL. But ya see, my closet's already exploding with stuff, so I can't buy everything... Just the MOST kawaii things!

I just put him in front of the camera in a kawaii pose, talk in a funny voice, aaand... "Hiii, I'm Kumanosuke! Ashley's friend! Today I'll be taking over to show you all the cool kawaii stuff in Kamihama." Are you ready? Kumanosuke's Kawaii Kamihama show is about to begin!
